description: A new study suggests that icy moons such as Mimas and Enceladus may host boiling subsurface oceans triggered by thinning ice shells and falling pressure. This low-temperature boiling could still support life beneath the surface. The research also explains geological features on larger icy moons and strengthens their potential as sites for finding extraterrestrial life.
title: Boiling Oceans May Hide Beneath Icy Moons, New Study Suggests

description: A new analysis of NASA’s Fermi telescope data reveals a faint gamma-ray halo around the Milky Way’s core, matching predictions for annihilating dark-matter particles. Researchers say no known astrophysical source fits the signal, raising the possibility of the first direct evidence of dark matter. Experts, however, stress caution and call for verification in other dark-matter-dense galaxies.
title: Dark Matter May Have Been Seen for the First Time in NASA Gamma-Ray Data

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover may have discovered its first meteorite on Mars, a 31-inch iron-nickel boulder named Phippsaksla found in Jezero Crater. Its pitted, coral-like texture and unusually high metal content resemble meteorites previously identified by Curiosity, Spirit, and Opportunity. Scientists are now analysing the rock’s composition in detail to determine whether it truly originated beyond Mars and represents a new confirmed meteorite discovery.
title: NASA’s Perseverance May Have Found Its First Meteorite on Mars

description: Starring Olivia Holt and Connor Swingdell in the lead roles, Jingle Bell Hiest is a romantic comedy film that has finally made its way to the digital screens. Written by Abby McDonald and Amy Reed, this film stars Olivia Holt and Connor Swindells in the lead roles.
title: Jingle Bell Heist Now Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch This Romance Comedy Film

description: Starring Chris Hemsworth and Daniel Bruhl in the lead roles, Rush is a motorsport Bigoraphic film that revolves around the rivalry between the drivers of the Formula One.
title: Rush OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Saali Mohabbat is an upcoming thriller movie that stars Radhika Apte in the lead role. It revolves around a housewife who is entangled in a web of betrayal, infidelity, and murder.
title: Saali Mohabbat OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch This Radhika Apte Starrer Thriller Movie

description: DC Studios’ Superman (2025) arrives on JioHotstar with new action, deep emotion, and the addition of Krypto. Directed by James Gunn, the film highlights Clark Kent’s journey of identity, hope, and heroism. With strong visuals and heartfelt storytelling, it is set to become one of the biggest superhero releases of the year.
title: Superman (2025) OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Sunshine, Antoninette Jadaone's Filipino movie, as the director is known for making movies based on real issues, explores pregnancy and abortion being illegal in the Philippines. It is now streaming on Netflix.
title: Sunshine Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: The iQOO 15 is almost at par with other 2025 flagships, such as the OnePlus 15, the Oppo Find X9, and the Realme GT 8 Pro, in terms of pricing. It aims to close the gap with its competitors. The brand, however, isn’t attempting to reinvent the flagship formula but to refine the experience in key areas that matter day-to-day.
title: iQOO 15 Review: Big Steps Forward

description: Poco F8 Pro, Realme GT 8 Pro, and Xiaomi 17 Pro all compete in the premium segment with powerful chipsets, high-end displays, large batteries, and advanced camera systems. Pricing varies significantly across regions, with Poco positioned as the most affordable, Realme offering top-tier hardware, and Xiaomi emphasising design and Leica-tuned imaging. Each model brings its own strengths in performance, display quality, and features such as wireless charging or secondary screens. With these differences in mind, which of the three should you buy?
title: Poco F8 Pro Vs Realme GT 8 Pro Vs Xiaomi 17 Pro: Prices, Specifications Compared

description: Here's a quick comparison between the Poco F8 Ultra and Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, highlighting their features, specifications, similarities and pricing to determine which is a good pick. Both models have similar screen sizes, dust and water resistance, and rear camera systems. However, the Poco F8 Ultra has a larger battery and charging speed.
title: Poco F8 Ultra vs Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra: Features, Price and Specifications Compared

description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang questioned managers discouraging AI use, urging employees to automate all possible tasks, stating they would still have work. This approach aligns with similar initiatives at Microsoft, Meta, Google, and Amazon to incorporate AI usage into performance expectations. Huang also addressed "AI bubble" concerns following the company's record Q3 revenue.
title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Says Company Managers Using Less AI Are Insane: Report

description: Tesla has announced its first Tesla Centre in India. The facility is positioned as an all-in-one location, offering retail, after-sales support, deliveries, logistics and charging services under one space. The centre opens on November 27 and is located at Orchid Business Park in Gurugram. This marks another step in Tesla’s expansion in the country, following the earlier rollout of Tesla Experience Centres in Mumbai and Delhi.
title: First Tesla Centre in India to Open Doors on November 27 With Charging, Retail, and After-Sales Services

description: The Moto G67 Power is a budget smartphone from Motorola with a really confusing price tag, as there are devices from Motorola’s own lineup that lock horns with it at a slightly higher price. Despite having good hardware on paper, the new Moto G67 Power, will only cater to the needs of those on a very tight budget.
title: Moto G67 Power Review: Big on Power, Low on Price

description: OnePlus Ace 6 Turbo could be launched early next year as the third model in the tech firm's Ace 6 lineup, according to a tipster. It is expected to launch with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset, paired with a 9,000mAh battery. It might sport a 6.78-inch LTPS display with 1.5K resolution. It is tipped to offer up to 144Hz or 165Hz screen refresh rate. Globally, including in India, the phone might be launched as the OnePlus Nord 6. However, the company has yet to confirm these details.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 Turbo Tipped to Launch Next Year With a Snapdragon Chip, 9,000mAh Battery

description: Redmi Pad 2 Pro is now expected to launch in China soon. Xiaomi's sub-brand Redmi is reportedly preparing to unveil the tablet alongside the Redmi Buds 8 Pro earbuds in its home country. They are said to be in the regulatory filing stage, suggesting that launch could be just around the corner. The tablet is already available in global markets. It has a 12.1-inch display and features a Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 chipset under the hood.
title: Redmi Pad 2 Pro, Redmi Buds 8 Pro Could Launch in China Soon

description: A global shortage of DRAM memory chips, driven by demand from AI data centers, is causing severe price increases for PC and smartphone components. Some RAM prices have reportedly tripled in months, leading computer stores to stop displaying fixed prices due to market volatility. The impact is also felt in related sectors like GPUs, gaming consoles, and smartphones, with the price surge expected to continue.
title: Why RAM Prices Are Skyrocketing: Smartphone, PC and Gaming Console Prices to Be Impacted

description: Microsoft’s November 2025 Xbox update adds the Gaming Copilot beta to the Xbox mobile app, expands the full-screen experience to more Windows devices, and enables cloud streaming at up to 1440p for select titles. Xbox Cloud Gaming has also launched in India and gained wider support on LG and Fire TV devices in other regions. Microsoft says over 1,000 titles now support streaming from a user’s own game library.
title: Xbox November 2025 Update Brings Gaming Copilot, Full Screen Experience Expansion and Cloud Upgrades

description: Aukaat Ke Bahar, starring Elvish Yadav, shows the story of a 19-year-old in college and his struggle between life, career, ambition and relationship.
title: Aukaat Ke Bahar OTT Release Revealed: Where to Watch Elvish Yadav Starrer Series Online?

description: Honor Watch X5 has been launched in China in two colour options. It has a 1.97-inch AMOLED display and offers several health monitoring features, such as heart rate tracking and sleep monitoring. The Honor Watch X5  offers different sports modes and features an IP68-rated build and 5ATM (50-meter) certification. It is currently available in China for CNY 449.
title: Honor Watch X5 Launched With 1.97-Inch AMOLED Display, Up to 14 Days Battery Life

description: Mass Jathara is gaining attention across social media and OTT discussions for its intense action sequences and Ravi Teja’s energetic performance. Audiences are talking about the film's festival-themed setting, its dramatic showdown scenes, and its blend of cultural storytelling with commercial action.
title: Mass Jathara OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Ravi Teja Starrer Online?

description: Akhil Raj and Tejaswi Rao, in Saailu Kampati's Raju Weds Rambai, show how they elope together and the story unfolds thereafter, now running in theatres.
title: Raju Weds Rambai OTT Release Date Reportedly Leaked Online: When and Where to Watch Akhil Raj and Tejaswi Rao Starrer Online?

description: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach could be coming to PC sooner rather than later. A PC port of the action-adventure game has been rated by the ESRB. The listing can be found on the ESRB website, suggesting the game could be coming to PC next year.
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach PC Port Leaks, Gets ESRB Rating

description: Directed by Ashish Khurana, Gharwali Pedwali is an &TV original series that is set to land on ZEE 5 soon. The series stars Paras Arora in the lead role.
title: Gharwali Pedwali OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch This Supernatural Comedy Series Online

description: Microsoft introduces several new shopping-focused AI features to Copilot Mode in the Edge browser. Users can now access capabilities, such as Cashback, Price comparison, Price history, Product insights, and Price tracking, from within the browser. These features are currently only available in the US. This makes it the fourth AI company, after Google, OpenAI, and Perplexity, that is targeting the upcoming holiday season to drive engagement on its platform.
title: Microsoft Joins AI Shopping War, Brings New Features to Copilot in Edge Browser

description: Poco Pad X1 and Pad M1 were launched globally during the company's November 2025 launch event in Bali, Indonesia. The Pad X1 is equipped with a Snapdragon 7 series chip and a 3.2K resolution display.
title: Poco Pad X1 Launched With Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 Chipset, 8,850mAh Battery, Alongside Pad M1: Price, Specifications

description: Redmi 15C 5G was launched in Poland in September. Now, the company could be preparing to unveiled the handset in India as well, as its price and specifications have surfaced online again. The latest leak suggests that it could be launched in India with a higher price tag than previously anticipated. The Redmi 15C 5G appears to ship with similar specifications as its Polish counterpart. It might be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity SoC, paired with a 6,000mAh battery. It might run on Android 15-based HyperOS 2.
title: Redmi 15C 5G Price in India, Specifications Leaked Again; Could Cost More Than Earlier Expected

description: Character.AI has introduced Stories, a new interactive format that lets users play through branching fictional tales with selected characters. Designed especially for under-18 users, it offers a visual, choice-driven storytelling experience where decisions shape the plot. Users can pick characters, set a premise and genre, explore multiple endings, and share their stories with others on the platform.
title: Character.AI Introduces Stories, a New Interactive and Shareable Storytelling Format

description: iQOO 15 was launched in India by the Vivo sub-brand on Wednesday as the successor to the iQOO 13. Powering the smartphone is Qualcomm's octa core 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, paired with SuperComputing Chip Q3. It is equipped with a 7,000mAh silicon-carbon battery with 100W wired fast charging support. The phone is available in the country via Amazon in Legend and Alpha Black colour options. It carries a triple rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary shooter. Moreover, it gets a 32-megapixel front-facing camera.
title: iQOO 15 Launched in India With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset, 7,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Nothing shared a new teaser on its community page featuring a shiny version of the Pokémon Arcanine. The latest post likely points to the upcoming release of the Community Edition of the Phone 3a. Nothing held a design competition for the Phone 3a Community Edition earlier this year and announced the winners in May. The new teaser also includes the names of the winners.
title: Nothing’s Latest Cryptic Teaser Hints at Phone 3a Community Edition

description: OnePlus on Wednesday confirmed that the OnePlus 15R will run on the newly launched Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset. The handset will be the first to feature the latest chip. The new chipset is claimed to deliver a massive 36 percent increase in CPU performance over the previous generation.
title: OnePlus 15R to Launch as the First Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC-Powered Smartphone Globally

description: OpenAI has updated ChatGPT’s Voice Mode so it now works directly inside the chat interface instead of opening a full-screen view. This lets users speak to the AI while seeing messages, visuals and tools such as Shopping Research. The change also makes it easier to generate and review images or code without ending a voice session. A toggle in settings restores the previous full-screen mode.
title: OpenAI Integrates ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode Directly Within the Chat Interface

description: The Poco C85 5G Indian variant reportedly runs on Android 16 Beta (SDK 36). Ahead of the rollout, the smartphone has reportedly appeared on a certification website, confirming the name and hinting at key specifications. The listing suggests the handset will feature a waterdrop-style notch for the front camera and could be powered by the Dimensity 6100+ chipset.
title: POCO C85 5G Indian Variant Reportedly Listed on Google Play Console; Design, Key Specifications Revealed

description: Poco has launched the Poco F8 Ultra and Poco F8 Pro globally. The F8 Ultra features a 6.9-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, triple 50-megapixel rear cameras, a 32-megapixel front camera, and a 6,500mAh battery with 100W charging. The F8 Pro offers a smaller 6.59-inch AMOLED screen, Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, a 50-megapixel triple-camera setup, and a 6,210mAh battery with 100W charging. Both run HyperOS 3 and include Bose-tuned speakers.
title: Poco F8 Pro and F8 Ultra With Snapdragon 8 Elite Series SoCs Launched: Price, Specifications and Features

description: Qualcomm has introduced the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, a chipset positioned below the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 but offering major improvements over the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3. Built on a 3 nm process, it features Oryon CPU cores at up to 3.8GHz, an Adreno 840 GPU, and the X80 5G modem. Qualcomm claims gains of 36 percent in CPU performance, 11 percent in GPU output, and 46 percent in AI tasks. The chip will debut in the upcoming OnePlus 15R handset.
title: Qualcomm Announces the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chipset: Features, Specifications

description: X is reportedly rolling out a new Android interface, according to a tipster, who claims the UI can be enabled through a hidden menu in version 11.42.0-release.0. The tipster also highlights limited-time discounts on X Premium plans, offering the first month of Premium for Rs. 100 and Premium+ for Rs. 890. The offer is said to run until December 2, 2025. Premium reduces ads and adds creator tools, while Premium+ removes ads entirely and provides the highest usage limits.
title: X Said to Be Rolling Out Hidden Android UI Update, Premium Plan for Rs 100 in India

description: Perplexity AI has released a new shopping assistant that lets users search for products, refine results and complete purchases within the same chat interface. The system uses natural-language prompts, remembers past conversations, and integrates PayPal for checkout. The feature is currently available to US users on the desktop and web interfaces.
title: Perplexity Launches AI Shopping Tool After Google and OpenAI as Holiday Season Shopping War Intensifies

description: The Rajasthani film Thekedari: The Blood Papers arrives on Chaupal with a striking story of courage and the fight against corruption. With emotional performances, strong direction, and a theme that questions society, the film leaves a lasting impact. Now streaming on the Chaupal app, it continues to draw attention for its powerful narrative and compelling characters.
title: Thekedari: The Blood Papers Now Streaming Online: Everthing You Need to Know

description: Starring Lee Soo Geun, Eun Ji Won, and Kyu Hyun, Three Idiots in Kenya is a Korean Travel Show that has now landed on the digital screens. The Trio will be seen exploring Kenya while overcoming challenges.
title: Three Idiots in Kenya Now Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch This Travel Show

description: Android devices are vulnerable to a newly identified Android Banking Trojan, called Sturnus, according to a report. The malware was found by MTI Security researchers. It is said to be targeting Android users primarily in the Southern and Central European countries. It is designed to give remote access to attackers, replicate banking apps' login pages to harvest banking credentials, and access end-to-end encrypted messages on WhatsApp, Telegram, and Signal. Moreover, it allows attackers to remotely turn the device screen blank.
title: Android Devices Vulnerable to New ‘Sturnus’ Malware That Attacks Bank Apps, Bypass E2E Encryption: Report

description: Google is upgrading Circle to Search to make it more seamless and conversational. According to a new report, Google app version 16.47.49 now sends all follow-up text queries to AI Mode instead of standard image search, though the update is still rolling out. Google first previewed this feature in July, but it wasn’t widely available until now. The update adds a new search bar at the bottom of the results screen, allowing continuous AI-powered queries and supporting tasks like homework help, visual problem-solving, and travel research.
title: Google Updates Circle to Search Feature With AI Mode for Additional Questions

description: A Snapdragon 8s Gen 4-powered smartphone could be in the works. It is said to come with a 9,000mAh battery and a 6.78-inch flat LTPS display with a 1.5K resolution. The leak doesn't include the name or launch timeline of the phone, but these specifications are expected to be associated with the Redmi Turbo 5 Pro.
title: Mysterious New Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 Phone Leaks Online; Tipped to Get 9,000mAh Battery

description: OnePlus has begun rolling out the stable OxygenOS 16 update for the OnePlus Nord 4 in India, the company confirmed through its community forum on Tuesday. The update is based on Android 16 and introduces new Flux themes, enhancements to Parallel Processing and Trinity Engine, and a refreshed Liquid Glass–style interface. It also adds several AI-powered features. Users will find expanded customisation controls for the home screen, lock screen, notification panel and Quick Settings layout.
title: OnePlus Nord 4 Gets OxygenOS 16 Update in India With New Customisation Options, AI-Powered Features

description: Realme P4x 5G will be launched in India by the Chinese smartphone maker on December 4 at noon, along with the new Realme Watch 5, the company announced on Wednesday.
title: Realme P4x 5G India Launch Date Set for Early December, Will Debut Alongside Watch 5

description: WhatsApp is reportedly testing a new feature for its Android app that adds a celebratory animation in chats. According to details shared by a feature tracker, the platform is working on a confetti effect that appears when users react to messages with certain emojis. The change is purely visual and aims to make reactions in Chats, Channels and Status updates feel more expressive.
title: WhatsApp for Android Said to Be Testing Confetti Animation for Emoji Reactions Ahead of New Year

description: Microsoft has announced that its Copilot AI chatbot will be discontinued on WhatsApp beginning January 15, 2026. The decision follows Meta’s updated Business API policies, which restrict AI developers and service providers from accessing or operating through the WhatsApp Business Solution. With this change, Microsoft becomes the second major AI company to withdraw its chatbot from the platform, following OpenAI’s exit in October.
title: Microsoft’s Copilot AI Chatbot to No Longer Be Available on WhatsApp Next Year

description: Poco F8 series global launch is only a few hours away. The launch event will see the unveiling of the Poco F8 Ultra, Poco F8 Pro, Poco Pad X1, and Pad M1. While the pricing of the upcoming phones is yet to be revealed, the tech firm has teased the key specifications of the two handsets. The Poco F8 Ultra will be powered by Qualcomm's octa core 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC. On the other hand, the Pro model will be equipped with last year's flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: Poco F8 Series Launching Today: Know Price, Features, Specifications and More

description: The iQOO 15 is scheduled to launch today (November 26) in India and global markets. The handset made its debut in China last month, and the company has already confirmed several key details ahead of the wider rollout, including its design, display, battery capacity and software. The iQOO 15 will be powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and feature a single-layer VC cooling system for thermal management, running Android 16 with OriginOS 6 on top.
title: iQOO 15 Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
